description: Welcome module that allows you to send a message to new members and assign them a role.

channel.description: Set the channel where the welcome messages will be sent.

channel.name: canal
channel.description: Channel where welcome messages will be sent.

type.description: Set the way in which the welcome message will be sent.

type.name: tipus
type.description: Way in which the welcome message will be sent.

role.description: Set the role you want to grant to the new members.

role.name: rol
role.description: Role that you want to grant to new members.

docs.description: Get the link of the welcomes module documentation.

view.description: View the settings of the welcomes module.

reset.description: Restableix les configuracions del mòdul a les originals (no es poden recuperar les dades).

confirmation.name: confirmació
confirmation.description: Estàs segur que vols restablir les dades d'aquest mòdul?
